review: I'd expected that as an Amazon device they had figured this would need to be as portable as my kindle and would work anywhere. it doesn't.I'm a UK amazon customer, living in the US, where I bought the stick, expecting it to work fine. despite resets and software updates it fails to be able to connect to the amazon content servers to stream anything BUT the music content (which works fine) the error messages are cryptic and whilst its promised that a future update will make it work with captive portal wifi (like in hotels) it doesn't yet.eventually i discovered that as its 'digital delivery' I need to change the location to the US on my account. there's nothing I've seen in any of the overly simplistic documentation that refers to this. I made the change, unfortunately its still a useless item.the stick has another few days before its going back.
author: Amazon Customer
